title: Baby Carrier
description: two inch border pattern surrounds central slight \"T\" shape; 2 1/4\" overlapping abstract floral pattern outlined in chain stitch; red, blue and tan colors; 3/4\" white border outside edge; dark blue indigo lining
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
